sentences.sContent: If cure is undeserved, activationed its melanin cell, sequential meeting is more serious ah.
sentences.sContent_eng: If cure is undeserved, activationed its melanin cell, sequential meeting is more serious ah.
sentences.sCn: 假如治疗不当，激活了它的黑色素细胞，后果会更严重的啊。

sentences.sContent: This caused them to lose their ongoing ability to make new melanin, the pigment that gives color to hair and skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: This caused them to lose their ongoing ability to make new melanin, the pigment that gives color to hair and skin.
sentences.sCn: 这将致使其失去现有制造新黑色素的功能，而正是由于这种色素，毛发和皮肤才有颜色。

sentences.sContent: Galanin, cocaine and amphetamine regulated transcript peptide (CART) and melanin concentrating hormone (MCH), etc. , which were related to the regulation of appetite, were expressed in pituitary.
sentences.sContent_eng: Galanin, cocaine and amphetamine regulated transcript peptide (CART) and melanin concentrating hormone (MCH), etc. , which were related to the regulation of appetite, were expressed in pituitary.
sentences.sCn: 垂体表达甘丙肽、可卡因和安非他明调节的转录肽（CART）及黑色素浓集激素（MCH）等与食欲调节有关的激素。

trans.tranOther: a natural dark brown colour in human skin, hair, and eyes
